## Appendix: Definitions

| Metric | Definition |
|--------|------------|
| Open Rate | % of delivered emails opened (unique) |
| Reply Rate | % of delivered emails receiving a reply |
| Positive Reply | Response indicating interest in meeting/learning more |
| Meeting Booked | Confirmed calendar invite with prospect |
| ICP Match | Lead matching Ideal Customer Profile criteria |
